price: Rabbiin lubbuu hunda waan isheen dalagdeen mindaa galchuuf (kana godhe). Dhugumatti, Rabbiin herregni isaa saffisaadha.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu kulla nafsin mā kasabat inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
